_source.short_desc: Solution to engage and monitor students, with built in content monitoring and filtering.
_source.long_desc: Solution to engage and monitor students, with built in content monitoring and filtering.

category_features.name: Block Websites/Applications
category_features.definition: Block certain websites/applications from School IP that are not approved for students

category_features.name: Built-in LMS
category_features.definition: LMS functionality built-in for content delivery

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Provides a channel for team members to share media files, communicate, and work together

category_features.name: For Classroom
category_features.definition: The software is designed for classrooms

category_features.name: For Labs
category_features.definition: The software can be customized to be used in individual labs for different subjects

category_features.name: Internet Usage Monitoring
category_features.definition: Keep a track of activities performed  students over the Internet

category_features.name: Real-Time Chat
category_features.definition: Engage in direct, instant messaging

category_features.name: Remote Access/Control
category_features.definition: Access a computer or data from a distant location

category_features.name: Report Cards
category_features.definition: Generate report cards for students performance

category_features.name: Support Audio/Images/Video
category_features.definition: Allow media to be embedded in the question or answer options

category_features.name: Tests/Assessments
category_features.definition: Create tools to measure student retention of learning material and lessons

category_features.name: Transcripts
category_features.definition: Export text transcripts for the chat between two or more individuals

category_features.name: View Student Monitors
category_features.definition: Allows instructors to have a live view of the student's monitor and the activities performed  them

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Electronic Signature
category_features.definition: Sign a document within the system

category_features.name: Employee Activity Monitoring
category_features.definition: Monitor and track what your employees are doing

category_features.name: Live Chat
category_features.definition: Ability to chat online in real time

category_features.name: Meeting Management
category_features.definition: Coordinate schedules and organize meetings

category_features.name: Remote Access/Control
category_features.definition: Access work applications remotely while working from outside the office and/or travelling

category_features.name: Remote Support
category_features.definition: Provide support to your customers and employees remotely over a shared network

category_features.name: Softphone
category_features.definition: Use your computer as a phone device to make calls over the internet

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Time Zone Tracking
category_features.definition: Identify and track locations and time zones of your collaborators to enable productive scheduling and cooperation

category_features.name: Video Chat
category_features.definition: Chat with your counterparts over the video in real time

category_features.name: Video Conferencing
category_features.definition: Connect with meeting participants remotely over the web

category_features.name: Communication Management
category_features.definition: Communicate with and outreach to followers/customers/clients in multiple ways

category_features.name: Community Management
category_features.definition: Enable students, customers or employees to engage with each other in a particular space online or offline

category_features.name: Event Calendar
category_features.definition: A list of events with their respective dates

category_features.name: Higher Education
category_features.definition: Software designed for higher education organizations

category_features.name: Interactive Learning
category_features.definition: Students are encouraged to interact with technology-enabled study materials during the course of learning

category_features.name: K-12
category_features.definition: Software designed for kindergarten through 12th grade schools

category_features.name: Location Tracking
category_features.definition: Identify an individual's or an asset's location at any given point in time

category_features.name: Mobile App
category_features.definition: Access/operate the system via mobile application

category_features.name: Orientation Workflow Management
category_features.definition: Create orientation programs for new employees or students

category_features.name: Polls/Voting
category_features.definition: Create quick polls to keep people engaged

category_features.name: Safety Management
category_features.definition: Tracks important safety documents, performance metrics and helps to prove compliance

category_features.name: Student Group Management
category_features.definition: Curate interest-based student communities, promote their creation, and encourage student participation

category_features.name: Attendance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track specific people who attended events or the total number of attendees

category_features.name: Breakout Rooms
category_features.definition: Sub-room created within virtual meeting/class

category_features.name: File Sharing
category_features.definition: Digitally share a wide variety of media types

category_features.name: Interactive Whiteboard
category_features.definition: Virtual whiteboards allow instructors to share information with students in real-time

category_features.name: LMS Integration (LTI)
category_features.definition: Integration with LMS system

category_features.name: Polls/Voting
category_features.definition: Create quick polls to keep people engaged.

category_features.name: Raise Hand
category_features.definition: Notify presenter that attendee wishes to speak

category_features.name: Real-Time Chat
category_features.definition: Engage in direct, instant messaging

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Session Recording
category_features.definition: Record active support and chat sessions for auditing and training

category_features.name: Two Way Audio & Video
category_features.definition: Presenter can see and hear participants and vice versa.

related_products.short_desc: Easy-to-use software to help your school save time, improve enrollment and fulfill its mission.
related_products.features: Administrators, help your school save time, improve enrollment and fulfill its mission. Attendance, communication tools, lesson plans, reporting, Google Classroom Integration, and more -- all in one integrated platform that's easy to use. Gradelink is entirely internet-based so you and your staff can work anywhere, making it ideal for bolstering distance learning. Plus you'll enjoy personalized training and support at no additional charge.

related_products.short_desc: Manage class scheduling and registration, billing and payments, communications, and reporting all from one convenient software online.
related_products.features: Developed by school owners, for school owners, iClassPro is the worlds best online class management software solution for class-based businesses. A subscription to iClassPro includes features for class and camp schedule, enrollment tracking, communications, accounts receivable, online registration, reporting and more. iClassPro has an amazing support team is available to help every step of the way.

related_products.short_desc: Schoology, a PowerSchool company, is the education technology company putting collaboration at the heart of the learning experience.
related_products.features: Schoology seamlessly connects learning management with assessments so that school districts can improve student performance, foster collaboration throughout their community, and personalize learning for every student. Every day millions of students, parents, faculty and administrators from nearly 2,000 K-12 school districts leverage Schoology to advance what is possible in education.

related_products.short_desc: Alma's mission is to help create the greatest generation of educators so that they can create the greatest generation of students.
related_products.features:
Alma's future-proof student information system tools optimize K-12 school operations, empowering educators to improve family engagement and student outcomes. From daily processes to community-wide communication and state reporting, Alma's solutions enhance educational best practices. Our mission is to help create the greatest generation of educators so that they can create the greatest generation of students.

Empower progress. Spark potential.

related_products.short_desc: Web-based gradebook and school management system for individual teachers, schools, and districts.
related_products.features: An affordable, easy-to-use, web-based gradebook and school management system offering a wide array of features for individual teachers, schools and districts.  Features include student, class, and grade management, attendance and behavior tracking, custom report generation, and extensive student and parent communication features. Individual web portal accounts for students and parents are included with all subscriptions at no additional cost.

related_products.short_desc: Built by and for children's activity providers, Sawyer offers class management software for online scheduling, online payments, & more.
related_products.features: Sawyer is an all-in-one software that allows educators to build custom class schedules and easily manage online registration, payment processing, parent communications and more. Our dedicated and top-rated support team provides training videos, hosted webinars, and business resources for educational leaders to bring our community together. Our software is flexibly priced to suit your business and requires no long term contracts.

related_products.short_desc: Thinkific is an all-in-one platform that empowers experts & teachers to quickly create and deliver stunning courses on their own sites.
related_products.features:
Thinkific is an all-in-one online course platform that empowers anyone to quickly create and deliver stunning courses on their own branded site. Whether your goal is to educate your customers, to sell courses to earn revenue or to simply grow your brand and engage your audience, Thinkific makes it easy.

Join thousands of consultants, experts, authors, speakers, trainers, teachers, coaches, professional associations, and companies, and start selling courses on Thinkific today.

related_products.short_desc: Edsby is a modern digital classroom management system built just for the unique needs of K-12 school districts or regions.
related_products.features: The Edsby learning management system (LMS) for K-12 is an award-winning, next generation LMS made specifically for the needs of K-12 students, educators and parents. It has the broadest set of capabilities available in a single application and enables improved teaching effectiveness and student success in and out of the K-12 classroom with a familiar, social-style user experience.

related_products.short_desc: DyKnow is a classroom management software that helps teachers monitor devices, block distractions, and keep students on task
related_products.features: DyKnow is a virtual classroom management solution designed to help educational institutions monitor student activity, block off-task behavior, send messages and review class history using a centralized dashboard. The platform enables teachers to configure access for students, send push notifications, and view device usage statistics to analyze learners' engagement. The system facilitates distance, blended, and progressive learning as well as classroom management functionalities.

related_products.short_desc: Classroom management solution designed with features such as analytics, real-time grading, shared folders, classes, and libraries.
related_products.features:
Classroom management solution designed for students and teachers with features such as analytics, real-time grading, classes, and shared teacher libraries.

Classtime is a solution for teachers that complements in-class teaching with immediate feedback on students level of understanding. Create great questions, engage everyone, and improve understanding.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based PBIS and behavior management streamlines the behavior process. Get organized, save time, inform parents, improve behavior,
related_products.features: Cloud-based PBIS and behavior management streamlines the behavior process in schools. Organize behavior info across teachers and through time. 1-Click tardies minimize disruption and minimize lost instruction time. Histories available with a click whenever a parent drops by or calls. 1-Click merit points and rewards reinforce desired behavior. Auto consequences save time. Parent alerts and portal keep them informed. Non-punitive consequences help change behavior. Monitor reports and analytics.

similar_products.short_desc: Whether your classroom is in-person, virtual or a learning hybrid, Jamf School ensures learning and teaching is achievable for all.
similar_products.features: Jamf School is a Mobile Device Management (MDM) solution purpose-built for education. Deploy, inventory and secure your school's Mac, iPad, iPhone and Apple TV devices with ease. Pair with Jamf School's Teacher app, at no additional cost, to make lesson planning and classroom management a breeze for instructors.

similar_products.short_desc: EMS Software is a classroom management software made easy. EMS Classroom Scheduling Software simplifies Campus Management.
similar_products.features: EMS classroom management software: better classes, smoother exams. Trusted Across 75+ Countries. For more than 30 years, EMS has helped millions of customers make the most of their valuable spaces. Classroom management software for modern workplaces and college campuses. EMS helps transforming how people and classrooms work together. Eliminate Scheduling Headaches. Gain control. Save time. Meet Capacity Goals. Automate Scheduling Processes. Ensure Equipment Availability.Improve Space Utilization

similar_products.short_desc: Full-function class management, registration, billing and marketing system.
similar_products.features: Full-function class management, online registration, billing and marketing system.

similar_products.short_desc: VIZOR helps School Districts manage Chromebooks by simplifying allocation to students, 1:1 programs and device repairs.
similar_products.features: VIZOR helps School Districts manage Chromebooks and other IT Assets, like iPads, Projectors, by simplifying allocation to students, enabling 1:1 programs and track repairs. VIZOR integrates with the Google Admin Console and Student Information Systems such as PowerSchool. Automated notifications remind students and parents when devices are due for return. VIZOR can even remotely disable lost devices. Try Now.

similar_products.short_desc: Turning connects students with teachers through a collaborative hybrid learning platform.
similar_products.features: Turning is committed to helping instructors improve teaching and learning by providing you with all the tools that you need to create a hybrid learning program tailored for you and your students. Dojo360 featuring Virtual Classroom has a dynamic, modern user interface designed to maximize the learning engagement experience. Check attendance against the roster, monitor participation, chat with learners, and more. Track all interaction, participation, and more by class across time.

similar_products.short_desc: Alma's mission is to help create the greatest generation of educators so that they can create the greatest generation of students.
similar_products.features:
Alma's future-proof student information system tools optimize K-12 school operations, empowering educators to improve family engagement and student outcomes. From daily processes to community-wide communication and state reporting, Alma's solutions enhance educational best practices. Our mission is to help create the greatest generation of educators so that they can create the greatest generation of students.

similar_products.short_desc: ASAP offers educational organizations a trusted online system for both front-office public services and back-office administration.
similar_products.features: Designed from decades of insights from educators in afterschool programs, school districts, universities and private instruction, ASAP makes classroom management simpler and easier. Handle registrations, schedules, communications, payments and more from one central web portal. Simplify your workflows, gain control over financials and give your students - as well as your staff - a more manageable experience.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based PBIS and behavior management streamlines the behavior process. Get organized, save time, inform parents, improve behavior,
similar_products.features: Cloud-based PBIS and behavior management streamlines the behavior process in schools. Organize behavior info across teachers and through time. 1-Click tardies minimize disruption and minimize lost instruction time. Histories available with a click whenever a parent drops by or calls. 1-Click merit points and rewards reinforce desired behavior. Auto consequences save time. Parent alerts and portal keep them informed. Non-punitive consequences help change behavior. Monitor reports and analytics.

similar_products.short_desc: Schools use Parents Booking to schedule and host in-person and/or video meetings for parent-teacher conferences.
similar_products.features:
Parents Booking is used by thousands of schools around the world to connect millions of parents and teachers for in-person and/or timed video conversations.

Schools can try for free, and set up their parent-teacher conferences in minutes by connecting their school database and importing the required 'data' automatically.

Proven to increase your school's parent-teacher attendance and conversations, save money and save time, Parents Booking is the answer to all your 'parental engagement' needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Thinkific is an all-in-one platform that empowers experts & teachers to quickly create and deliver stunning courses on their own sites.

Thinkific is an all-in-one online course platform that empowers anyone to quickly create and deliver stunning courses on their own branded site. Join thousands of consultants, experts, authors, speakers, trainers, teachers, coaches, professional associations, and companies, and start selling courses on Thinkific today.

similar_products.short_desc: Classroom Management Software designed for training centres
similar_products.features:
*Now available in multiple languages*
Teach'n Go is a powerful, easy to use Classroom Management Software. With Teach 'n Go you can - get a quick overview of upcoming lessons and view accurate, up-to-date lesson records from all of your teachers in real-time. Schedule lessons on custom or recurring days, assign a teacher, location and students. Teachers can take attendance and view attendance history for individuals or classes. Teachers can interact with students through our group SMS function.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy-to-use software to help your school save time, improve enrollment and fulfill its mission.

Attendance, communication tools, lesson plans, reporting, Google Classroom Integration, and more -- all in one integrated platform that's easy to use. Gradelink is entirely internet-based so you and your staff can work anywhere, making it ideal for bolstering distance learning. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Course Authoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Course Authoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Course authoring software enables organizations to develop customized training courses for educating employees, or for teachers to develop courses for their students. Course content can often be imported from multiple applications, and presented in different media formats. Once developed, courses can be published through a Learning Management System (LMS) or Training software, or as stand alone computer / web based training.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Gradebook software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Gradebook tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Gradebook software automates grade tracking, performance assessment and monitoring of student attendance and provides easy access to synchronized data for teachers, principals and school administrators. Education professionals use Gradebook applications to aid in the development and evaluation of lesson plans and student assignments. They also provide features for assessing student performance along with integrated demographic data and state and federal guidelines. Gradebook software is related to Classroom Management software and School Administration software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top School Administration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of School Administration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: School Administration software automates the administrative functions of schools including student information, admissions and records for school administrators, office managers, accountants and registrars. School Administration applications manage all school information via a single interface, including: student, family and staff data, courses and classes and faculty data. They provide integration for admissions, enrollment and class scheduling and also perform billing and tuition management functions. School Administration software is related to Classroom Management software, Gradebook software and School Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Virtual Classroom software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Virtual Classroom tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Virtual Classroom Software allows teachers and instructors to engage with learners in an online setting. These products offer interactive whiteboards to share notes/lessons, attendance tracking, live chat, and breakout rooms to encourage collaboration between participants.
